name: postcss-plugin-bem-escape-block-name-less-modifier
description: this PostCSS plugin fixes minor problems in modifier class without block name in BEM(exactly MindBEMding)
author: yoshidax

scripts.release:patch: npm test && npm run build && npm version patch
scripts.release:minor: npm test && npm run build && npm version minor
scripts.release:major: npm test && npm run build && npm version major
scripts.release:quick: npm test && npm run build && git add -A && git commit -m 'Quick release patch' && npm version patch
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm publish --access public
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build && jest --coverage
